SKU649866.Name: Jane Goodall Playhome
SKU649866.Description: Part of our exclusive Jane Goodall Collection, this wildlife-themed playhouse was designed to spark kids' curiosity about the natural world. A perfect gift for little adventurers and growing explorers, it's filled with details inspired by Jane Goodall's work and modeled after animal research centers. The printed artwork includes a chimpanzee in a chair, vegetation, a map, research equipment and more. Plus, there's a roll-up door flap in front and screened windows beneath the roof.
Features: Part of our exclusive Jane Goodall Collection
Wildlife research-themed playhouse
Features detailed artwork, roll-up door flap and screened windows
100% cotton canvas fabric, metal poles, plastic pole connectors
Playhouse for indoor use only
Simple assembly required
Spot clean only
3 and up
Imported

SKU646448.Name: Kids Leopard Organic Hooded Towel
SKU646448.Description: Designed in partnership with the Jane Goodall Institute, our Kids Leopard Organic Hooded Towel was made just for little wild ones. It's an adventurous way to get all warm and cozy, with an enveloping design that wraps kids in gentle organic cotton fabric. The hood features a playful printed leopard face and adorable decorative ears that'll delight young nature-lovers. Make it extra-special by personalizing it with your kid's name, and mix or match with the rest of our Jane Goodall Hooded Towels inspired by animals of the Serengeti.
Features: Designed in partnership with the Jane Goodall Institute
Organic hooded towel with leopard design
100% organic cotton (exclusive of decoration)
This item can be personalized with a name for an additional $10 fee
Personalization not available with purchases on app
Personalized items are not eligible for returns or exchanges
Machine washable
Imported

Multicolor vegetation and vibrant butterflies pop against the white background for a wildly cool look sure to inspire growing nature lovers. A mix of cotton canvas and cotton jersey fabrics makes this machine washable sleeping bag snuggly soft yet durable. Add an extra special touch to this sleepover essential by personalizing it with your kid's name.

Sleeping bag with multicolor botanical design

SKU645012.Name: Jane Goodall Set of 3 Organic Swaddle Gift Set
SKU645012.Description: Stock up on pure organic comfort for baby with this adventurous swaddle set, designed in partnership with the Jane Goodall Institute. It includes three swaddles with nature-inspired prints, from spots and stripes to abstract icons. The double-layer organic cotton muslin fabric is cozy yet gentle and breathable—perfect for your little wild one. Conveniently machine washable.Bed linens are certified by GOTS, the Global Organic Textile Standard.
Features: Designed in partnership with the Jane Goodall Institute
Set of three swaddles with stripe, spot and abstract prints
100% organic cotton

SKU645450.Name: Sitting Chimp Pillow
SKU645450.Description: Add a touch of adventurous style and comfiness to the kids room with our chimp  throw pillow, designed in partnership with the Jane Goodall Institute. To the delight of mini explorers everywhere, this animal pal has a cool sketched look and a sweet, smiling face. With 100% cotton fabric, it might be the most huggable monkey we've met yet.
Features: Designed in partnership with the Jane Goodall Institute
Chimp-shaped throw pillow
100% cotton exterior with polyfill

SKU688898.Name: Little People Jane Goodall
SKU688898.Description: When Jane was little, her father gave her a toy chimpanzee named Jubilee. This inspired her lifelong love of animals, and she went to study them in the wild as soon as she could. Jane lived with chimpanzees in their natural habitat and became famous for her pioneering approach to research. She now educates the public on animal rights. This moving book features stylish illustrations and extra facts at the back, including a biographical timeline with historical photos and a detailed profile of the primatologist's life.
Features: Author: Maria Isabel Sanchez Vegara
Illustrator: Beatrice Cerocchi
Hardcover
32 pages
Ages 4—7
Imported

SKU659268.Name: Printed Play Chair Animal Print
SKU659268.Description: Designed in partnership with the Jane Goodall Institute, this play chair features a bold, wildlife-inspired spot print. With a seat crafted from rubberwood and metal steel tube legs, this comfy printed kids chair is durable enough for hours of playtime, reading and home learning. Mix and match with the rest of our Jane Goodall Play Chairs.

To reduce the risk of tipping, chair should only be used by children 3 and up
